sect1.title: Usage
sect1.para: This function checks to see if the given string is a valid property name for an object of the given type. The syntax for its use is b = pvalid(type,propertyname) where string is a string that contains the name of a valid graphics object type, and propertyname is a string that contains the name of the property to test for.

sect1.title: Example
sect1.para: Here we test for some properties on an axes object.

para.verbatim:
--> pvalid('axes','type')
ans = 1
--> pvalid('axes','children')
ans = 1
--> pvalid('axes','foobar')
ans = 0
